page.title: 04BROADFIELD SCHOOL - OLDHAM
page.content: Our school is called Broadfield Primary School.It was built two years ago.It is a single storey building, except for one section.there are 4 junior classrooms, a large tiled craft room, a resourses room with a television and three infant classes. We have seperate nursery classrooms, mainly tiled for messy work and a carpeted withdrawal area.The nursery has its own outdoor playground including a covered area so that they can play out in the rain.The grounds include an all-weather pitch and a rounders court. Gardens surrounding the school have been made by the Groundwork Trust,who gave us lots of trees and plants. There are 265 pupils and 9 teachers at the moment.
